name: Savage Opress
description: Durable Attacker that crushes low-health units and becomes stronger when attacked

abilities.name: StaggeringBlow
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance (doubled on a Critical Hit) to inflict Offense Down for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and gain Critical Chance Up and Critical Damage Up for 3 turns on a finishing blow. If the target has 50% Health or below, this attack deals massive damage and can't be Evaded.

abilities.name: PainIs Weakness
abilities.description: Sith allies gain 75% Defense and 30% Tenacity. Other allies gain half those amounts.

abilities.name: Brute
abilities.description: Whenever Savage takes damage, he gains Offense Up, Defense Up, and Heal Over Time for 2 turns and gains 30% Turn Meter. At the end of his turns, Savage Dispels all debuffs on a random other Sith ally and gains those debuffs for 1 turn. Dispel all debuffs from Savage whenever he is Critically Hit.

name: Ahsoka Tano (Fulcrum)
description: Enduring Rebel Attacker who shrugs off debuffs and consumes buffs to deal extra damage

abilities.name: BalancedStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy, gain Protection Up (40%) for 2 turns, and grant Protection Up (40%) to a random ally that doesn't have it for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Meditate
abilities.description: Ahsoka gains Foresight, Retribution, and each non-unique buff (excluding Taunt) present on other allies for 2 turns, then gains 15% Turn Meter for each buff on her.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.description: Consume all non-unique buffs on Ahsoka and deal Physical damage to target enemy. This attack scores an additional hit for each type of buff consumed. The target can't Evade and has -50% Armor against this attack.

abilities.name: Perseverance
abilities.description: Ahsoka is immune to Damage Over Time effects and gains 30% Critical Avoidance. At the end of each turn, Ahsoka dispels all debuffs on herself and loses 10% Health for each debuff dispelled, then recovers 5% Health for each buff on her. This Health Loss can't defeat Ahsoka.

name: Kylo Ren
description: Versatile First Order attacker that can reuse special attacks when damaged

abilities.name: RaggedCut
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 75% chance to inflict Healing Immunity for 2 turns and a 75% chance to inflict Damage Over Time for 3 turns.

abilities.name: LashOut
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies and gain Retribution for 2 turns. This attack can't Critically Hit and deals bonus damage equals to 50% of Kylo Ren's Critical Damage. First Order allies and allies with Advantage gain 25% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: Outrage
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and, if Kylo has full Health, inflict Stun for 1 turn. This attack deals 75% more damage if Kylo is below full Health. Recover Protection equal to the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Unstoppable
abilities.description: Whenever Kylo takes damage he gains 50% Defense and 15% Offense for 1 turn, and has a 50% chance to reset his cooldowns. Kylo takes reduced damage from Percent Health damage effects and gains 10 Speed for each debuff on him. Whenever Kylo uses a Special ability he gains Damage Over Time for 2 turns.

name: Darth Maul
description: Deadly Attacker that gains power and extra turns as enemies are defeated

abilities.name: RagingStorm
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. On a finishing blow, gain 100% Turn Meter and Offense Up for 2 turns. This attack deals double damage to Jedi.

abilities.name: WhirlingBlades
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies and inflict Daze for 2 turns. This attack deals double damage to Jedi.

abilities.name: DancingShadows
abilities.description: All Sith allies gain 20% Evasion, gain 20% Turn Meter and Stealth for 1 turn at the start of each encounter and whenever they Evade or are Critically Hit, can't be Critically Hit while Stealthed, and gain Advantage for 2 turns whenever Stealth expires. The Stealth and Turn Meter from this ability ignores Taunting allies.

abilities.name: Powerof Hatred
abilities.description: Darth Maul gains 20% Max Health, gains Max Health equal to 10% of the damage he deals, and Potency equal to 0.3% of his Max Health. Whenever an enemy is defeated, Darth Maul gains bonuses for the rest of the encounter.First Enemy: 25% Critical ChanceSecond Enemy: 25% EvasionThird Enemy: 25% Max Health recovery on hitting with an attack

name: CC-2224 "Cody"
description: Clone Attacker that Stuns and calls tons of Assists

abilities.name: AlphaStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and gain 20% Turn Meter. Gain an additional 20% Turn Meter if that enemy has more than 50% Health, and an additional 20% Turn Meter if that enemy has less than 50% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: AT-TEMass-Driver Cannon
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy and 35% less damage to all other enemies. If this attack scores at least 2 Critical Hits, Stun the primary target for 1 turn.

abilities.name: The212th Attack
abilities.description: Call all Clone allies and one random ally to assist. These Assists deal 40% less damage. Each time an Assist scores a Critical Hit, reduce the Cooldown of this ability by 1.

abilities.name: GhostCompany Commander
abilities.description: Clone allies gain 30% Critical Chance, and other allies gain half that amount. Cody gains 60% Defense for each living Clone ally and other Clone allies gain half that amount. Clone allies recover 5% of their Max Protection whenever they use a Basic ability.

name: BB-8
description: Persistent Resistance Droid who empowers allies by circulating Secret Intel

abilities.name: ArcWelder
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Tenacity Down for 2 turns. If the target already had Tenacity Down, inflict Daze for 2 turns.

abilities.name: CovertData Transfer
abilities.description: BB-8 and a random ally who doesn't have it gain the Secret Intel unique buff for 3 turns. Then, BB-8 gains 8% Turn Meter for each ally with Secret Intel. If all active allies are Droids, BB-8 gains Taunt for 1 turn.Secret Intel: +25% Potency and when another ally uses a Special ability they gain Secret Intel for 3 turns, then the cooldown of Illuminated Destiny is reduced by 1 for each ally with Secret Intel.

abilities.name: IlluminatedDestiny
abilities.description: Dispel all debuffs on all allies and Expose all enemies for 2 turns. All allies gain 80% Turn Meter and gain Advantage, Critical Chance Up, Critical Damage Up, Offense Up, and Speed Up for 4 turns. Droid and Resistance allies recover 20% Protection. This ability starts on cooldown and can't be Evaded. Whenever a Droid ally scores a Critical Hit, reduce the cooldown of this ability by 1.

abilities.name: Rollwith the Punches
abilities.description: BB-8 has 80% Counter Chance. When BB-8 attacks out of turn, he calls a random Resistance ally to Assist.

abilities.name: Self-PreservationProtocol
abilities.description: When BB-8 takes damage he has a 50% chance to gain Foresight for 2 turns. At the start of each encounter, if BB-8 is active, Droid allies gain 8% Turn Meter for each active Droid ally. When BB-8 Evades, Droid allies recover 8% Health and 8% Protection.

name: Director Krennic
description: Intimidating Empire Support who inflicts devastating debuffs and slows enemies

abilities.name: TestTheir Defenses
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy and inflict Tenacity Down for 3 turns.

abilities.name: DeathTrooper Assault
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies with a 70% chance to inflict Stagger for 2 turns. If any enemies are debuffed, revive Death Trooper with 20% Health for each debuffed enemy. If Death Trooper is present, he is called to Assist.

abilities.name: ExperimentalWeaponry
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy and inflict a debuff (Attacker: Stun, Healer/Support: Ability Block, Tank: Buff Immunity) for 2 turns. If the target is a Rebel, also inflict Speed Down for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Directorof Advanced Weapons Research
abilities.description: Empire allies gain 25% Critical Chance and 25% Potency. Debuffed enemies who are Critically Hit during an Empire ally's turn suffer Ability Block for 1 turn. This effect can't be Resisted. Empire allies recover 10% Protection whenever they score a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: ImmeasurablePower
abilities.description: Director Krennic gains 10% Critical Damage for each debuffed enemy and 10% Critical Damage for each Rebel enemy. If Death Trooper is present he also gains these bonuses.

name: Baze Malbus
description: Fearsome Rebel Tank who Taunts, dispels buffs, and inflicts debuffs

abilities.name: HeavyRepeater Cannon
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to inflict Speed Down for 3 turns. If Chirrut Îmwe is present, he gains 10% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: Unload
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies and Dispel all buffs on them. Empire enemies and enemies who were not buffed take bonus damage equal to 25% of their Max Health. If Chirrut Îmwe is present, he is called to Assist.

abilities.name: FierceReprisal
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and dispel all buffs on them. For each buff dispelled, inflict the opposite debuff, if any, for 2 turns.

abilities.name: ForJedha
abilities.description: Baze Malbus gains Taunt and Retribution for 1 turn at the start of each encounter, whenever an enemy is defeated, and whenever Chirrut Îmwe falls below 100% Health. Baze Malbus gains 5% Turn Meter whenever an enemy gains a buff.

abilities.name: DauntlessCourage
abilities.description: Baze Malbus gains Max Health equal to 20% of his Max Health. Chirrut Îmwe also gains that much Max Health.

name: Princess Leia
description: Well-rounded Rebel Attacker with extra attacks, Stealth, and team Critical bonuses.

abilities.name: HairTrigger
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to attack a second time and a 55% chance to attack a third time. Each attack has a 50% chance to grant 10% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: RebelTactics
abilities.description: Leia gains Stealth and Critical Damage Up for 3 turns and gains 50% Turn Meter. If Leia already had Stealth, she also gains Offense Up and Foresight for 3 turns and gains double Turn Meter.

abilities.name: Heartof the Rebellion
abilities.description: Rebel allies gain 20% Critical Chance.

abilities.name: AgainstAll Odds
abilities.description: Whenever Leia attacks, she has a 55% chance to grant all allies Critical Chance Up for 2 turns, and recovers 5% Health and 5% Protection.

name: Darth Nihilus
description: Sith Support that can instantly defeat enemies by draining cooldowns

abilities.name: CeaselessCraving
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy and Dispel all buffs on them. If any buffs were dispelled, reduce the cooldown of Drain Force by 1

abilities.name: DrainForce
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies with a 50% chance (doubled against debuffed enemies) to increase their cooldowns by 1. For each cooldown increased, reduce the cooldown of Annihilate by 1.

abilities.name: Annihilate
abilities.description: Instantly defeat target enemy. Nihilus gains Max Health equal to the target's Max Health. The defeated target can't be Revived. This ability can't be Evaded and starts on cooldown.

abilities.name: Lordof Hunger
abilities.description: Sith allies gain 60% Offense and 150% Health Steal. Sith allies lose all Protection and gain that much Max Health. Sith allies are immune to Healing effects that aren't Health Steal and can't score Critical Hits.

abilities.name: Woundin the Force
abilities.description: At the start of each of his turns, Nihilus inflicts Damage Over Time for 2 turns on a random enemy that doesn't have any debuffs. If all enemies are debuffed, inflict Damage Over Time on a random enemy. At the start of each enemy turn, Nihilus inflicts Health Down on them for 2 turns.

name: Emperor Palpatine
description: Overwhelming Sith Support who inflicts Shock and can Stun targets for multiple turns

abilities.name: LightningStrike
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy and Shock them for 3 turns. Then, Palpatine gains 15% Turn Meter for each Shocked enemy.

abilities.name: Powerof the Dark Side
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies with a 70% chance to Stun them for 1 turn. Shocked enemies are Stunned for 2 turns and have their Shock dispelled.

abilities.name: Letthe Hate Flow
abilities.description: All allies gain Offense Up for 2 turns and all units lose 5% of their Max Health. Palpatine recovers health equal to 150% the total amount lost. For each Shocked enemy gain 50% Turn Meter and refresh the duration of Shock to 2 turns.

abilities.name: Emperorof the Galactic Empire
abilities.description: Empire and Sith allies gain +32% Potency and Max Health. Jedi and Rebel enemies have -32% Potency and Evasion. Whenever an Empire ally inflicts a debuff during their turn they gain 20% Turn Meter. Whenever a Sith ally inflicts a debuff during their turn they recover 20% of their Max Health.

abilities.name: CracklingDoom
abilities.description: At the end of each of his turns, Palpatine deals Special damage to all Shocked enemies and then deals Special damage to all Jedi and Rebel enemies. This damage can't defeat enemies.

name: Grand Master Yoda
description: Masterful Jedi support that can replicate enemy buffs and share them with allies

abilities.name: Ataru
abilities.description: Deal physical damage to target enemy. If that enemy has more than 50% Health, Yoda gains 40% Turn Meter and Foresight for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Masterstroke
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies. In addition, for each positive status effect an enemy has, Yoda gains that effect for 3 turns. (Unique status effects can't be copied.)

abilities.name: UnstoppableForce
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to remove 70% Turn Meter. If that enemy had less than 100% Health, they are also Stunned for 1 turn.

abilities.name: BattleMeditation
abilities.description: Yoda gains Tenacity Up and Foresight for 2 turns, then grants each ally every non-unique buff he has (excluding Stealth and Taunt) for 2 turns, with a 40% chance to also grant Yoda 35% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: GrandMaster's Guidance
abilities.description: Jedi allies gain 30% Tenacity, gain 30% Turn Meter whenever they Resist a debuff, and whenever they suffer a debuff they gain Tenacity Up for 1 turn at the end of that turn.

name: Han Solo
description: Daring Attacker that stacks Criticals in his favor and always shoots first

abilities.name: QuickDraw
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If the target has less than 50% Turn Meter, deal 75% more damage. Otherwise, remove 35% Turn Meter. This attack can't be Evaded.

abilities.name: Deadeye
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and Stun them for 1 turn. Gain Turn Meter equal to Han's Critical Chance.

abilities.name: NeverTell Me The Odds
abilities.description: All allies gain Critical Chance Up and Evasion Up for 2 turns. Han gains 50% Turn Meter and Critical Damage Up for 2 turns.

abilities.name: ShootsFirst
abilities.description: Han has +35% Counter Chance and +20% Critical Chance. The first time each turn Han uses his Basic attack, he attacks again dealing 50% less damage.Han takes a bonus turn at the start of each encounter. During this turn Han ignores Taunts and he can only use his Basic ability, but it will Stun the target for 1 turn and can't be Resisted.

name: Eeth Koth
description: Stunning Jedi Support extremely effective against Droids

abilities.name: BreachingStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to inflict Defense Down for 3 turns. If the target is a Droid, this attack has a 100% chance.

abilities.name: ForcePush
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy with a 75% chance to Stun for 1 turn and a 100% chance to inflict Ability Block for 3 turns if the target is a Droid.

abilities.name: StalwartJedi Defender
abilities.description: Jedi allies gain 60 Defense.

abilities.name: Anti-DroidSpecialist
abilities.description: Eeth Koth has +35% Critical Chance and +20% Critical Damage when attacking Droids.

name: K-2SO
description: Rebel Tank who Taunts and Counter Attacks

abilities.name: CarboplastComposite Fist
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to inflict Offense Down for 2 turns.

abilities.name: ConductiveCharge
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and Daze them for 2 turns. If Cassian Andor is present, he is called to Assist.

abilities.name: Enforcer
abilities.description: Whenever K-2SO attacks he has a 75% (100% while buffed) chance to Taunt for 1 turn. This taunt is dispelled whenever K-2SO takes damage.

abilities.name: ReprogrammedImperial Droid
abilities.description: K-2SO has +97.6% Counter Chance. This chance is halved while K-2SO is debuffed. In addition, K-2SO gains 1% Max Protection whenever he takes damage.

name: Admiral Ackbar
description: Rebel Support that can Dispel debuffs and grant allies extra turns

abilities.name: QuickShot
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 55% chance to gain 45% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: It'sa Trap!
abilities.description: Dispel all negative status effects from all allies. Each ally recovers 9% of their Max Health for each effect dispelled this way. Admiral Ackbar has a 25% chance to gain 40% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: TacticalGenius
abilities.description: Ackbar grants each ally the Tactical Genius effect. The first ally to use a Special ability while they have this effect gains 100% Turn Meter and recovers 30% of their Max Health. Tactical Genius ends whenever any ally triggers this effect or at the end of Ackbar's next turn.

abilities.name: RebelCoordination
abilities.description: Rebel allies have +25 Speed and +10% Tenacity. In addition, whenever an ally uses an ability that isn't an attack, they call a Rebel ally to Assist.

name: Jawa Engineer
description: High-speed Jawa Healer with a Critical Chance buff and both Jawa and Droid synergy

abilities.name: MiniaturizedDetonator
abilities.description: Apply a Detonator to target enemy that detonates after 1 turn, dealing damage.

abilities.name: PatchUp
abilities.description: Jawa Engineer revives a random Droid ally at 1% Health, and then all allies recover 30% of their Max Health.

abilities.name: Recalibrate
abilities.description: All allies gain Critical Chance Up for 2 turns. Jawa and Droid allies also gain 45% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: CrunchTime
abilities.description: Jawa Engineer has +10 Speed for each Jawa or Droid ally.

name: Sun Fac
description: Geonosian Tank that punishes attackers with a variety of negative status effects

abilities.name: Browbeat
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and Dispel all positive status effects on them. Sun Fac recovers 20% of his Max Health if any effects were dispelled this way.

abilities.name: Subjugate
abilities.description: Sun Fac Taunts for 2 turns and inflicts Offense Down on target enemy for 2 turns, with a 55% chance to also remove 40% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: SpitefulStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. Sun Fac recovers 25% of his Max Health if the target is suffering any negative status effects.

abilities.name: Superiority
abilities.description: Sun Fac has +50% Counter Chance. In addition, whenever he attacks outside of his turn, he deals 15% more damage and inflicts Critical Chance Down for 2 turns.

name: Poe Dameron
description: Resistance Tank with a Taunt that inflicts Expose for big reversals

abilities.name: ChallengingShot
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 40% chance to inflict Offense Down for 2 turns. This chance is doubled if the target is suffering any negative status effects.

abilities.name: ResistanceBravado
abilities.description: Taunt for 2 turns and remove 25% Turn Meter from each enemy, with a 65% chance to also Expose them for 2 turns. Inflict Buff Immunity for 2 turns on the primary target.

abilities.name: Aceof the Resistance
abilities.description: Resistance allies gain 30% Offense and 15% Potency.

abilities.name: StandFirm
abilities.description: Poe has +22% Tenacity and recovers 7.5% of his Max Health whenever he resists a negative status effect. If Finn is present, he also gains these bonuses.Whenever Poe loses Taunt, Finn gains taunt for 1 turn.

name: IG-88
description: Droid Attacker with debuffs and a damage bonus against debuffed enemies

abilities.name: MortalWound
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 60% chance to inflict Healing Immunity for 2 Turns.

abilities.name: RapidFire
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 55% chance to inflict Ability Block for 1 Turn and a 50% chance to inflict Defense Down for 2 turns.

abilities.name: ResourcefulPursuer
abilities.description: All allies gain 20% Critical Chance and inflict a Damage Over Time effect whenever they score a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: AdaptiveAim Algorithm
abilities.description: IG-88 has +45% Critical Damage and deals 20% more damage for each enemy suffering a negative status effect.

name: Kanan Jarrus
description: Durable Phoenix Tank that keeps enemy Offense crippled and allies healthy

abilities.name: DisarmingStrike
abilities.description: Deal physical damage to target enemy and inflict Offense Down until the start of Kanan's next turn. If this attack scores a Critical Hit, this effect can't be Resisted. This ability gains +15% Critical Hit Chance for each ally under full Health.

abilities.name: Intervene
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and Taunt for 2 turns, then Dispel all debuffs on another target ally. While Kanan has this taunt buff, his Tenacity is doubled.

abilities.name: TotalDefense
abilities.description: Dispel all debuffs on Phoenix allies and grant them Defense Up for 3 turns. Kanan grants himself and another target ally Foresight and Protection Up (40%) for 2 turns. When each of these Foresights expire, Kanan gains 100% Turn Meter and other Phoenix allies gain 50% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: ClearMind
abilities.description: Kanan has 70% Counter chance and recovers 25% Health whenever he suffers a debuff.

name: Colonel Starck
description: Offensive Support who provides critical buffs and removes enemy Turn Meter

abilities.name: DebilitatingShot
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Defense Down for 2 turns. If the target was already debuffed, deal double damage.

abilities.name: ScanAll Wavelengths
abilities.description: Empire allies gain Critical Chance Up and Critical Damage Up for 3 turns. Starck gains 5% Turn Meter for each Empire ally and each Rebel enemy.

abilities.name: BlizzardFour Barrage
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 50% chance to Stagger them. Dispel all buffs on the primary target. For each active Imperial Trooper ally, deal 10% more damage and reduce the cooldown of this ability by 1.

abilities.name: ImperialIntelligence
abilities.description: At the end of his turn, Starck recovers 7% Health and 3% Protection, and removes 1% Turn Meter from all enemies for each active Empire ally (doubled for Imperial Trooper allies).While Starck is active, Imperial Trooper allies have +50 Armor Penetration.

name: Lando Calrissian
description: Scoundrel leader with high offense and excellent Critical Hit synergy

abilities.name: Gambler'sShot
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. This attack has high damage variance and an additional 30% chance of scoring a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: DoubleDown
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies. If this attack scores more than one Critical Hit, its cooldown is reset and it deals 100% more damage on its next use.

abilities.name: Fastand Loose
abilities.description: Scoundrel and Rebel allies gain 15 Speed and 29% Critical Damage.

abilities.name: HighRoller
abilities.description: Lando has +15% Critical Chance, and gains Critical Chance Up for 2 turns when he scores a Critical Hit.

name: Death Trooper
description: Terrifying Empire Attacker who inflicts debilitating debuffs and prevents revives

abilities.name: TrackDown
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to inflict Daze for 3 turns. If the target was already Dazed, Stun them for 1 turn. If the target is a Rebel, attack again.

abilities.name: DeathTrooper Grenade
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies and Dispel all buffs on them with a 70% chance to inflict Healing Immunity for 2 turns. Enemies who were not buffed have their cooldowns increased by 1.

abilities.name: Terminate
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If the target is suffering any debuffs, this attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit. If there are any defeated enemies, also inflict Deathmark for 2 turns, which can't be Resisted. Targets defeated by Terminate can't be revived.

abilities.name: Krennic'sGuard
abilities.description: Whenever Death Trooper scores a Critical Hit, he and Director Krennic recover 20% Health. Death Trooper has a 50% chance to gain 100% Turn Meter whenever Director Krennic takes damage. Director Krennic can't be Critically Hit while Death Trooper is alive.While Death Trooper is active, Imperial Trooper allies have +10% Health Steal.

name: Veteran Smuggler Chewbacca
description: Lumbering attacker who accumulates Offensive capabilities as enemies take actions

abilities.name: ExplosiveBolts
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with 80% chance to inflict Daze for 2 turns.

abilities.name: FuriousBlow
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. Dispel all buffs on them and Stun them for 1 turn. Inflict Speed Down on all enemies for 2 turns.

abilities.name: PartnerIn Crime
abilities.description: Chewbacca has 25% Critical Chance and +50% Health Steal. When Veteran Smuggler Han Solo takes damage, Chewbacca gains 20% Critical Damage (stacking) until he scores a Critical Hit. When Veteran Smuggler Han Solo is defeated, Chewbacca gains 100% Turn Meter, his cooldowns are reset, and he takes additional turn after his next turn.

abilities.name: Letthe Wookiee Win
abilities.description: At the start of each enemy turn, Chewbacca gains 12% Offense (stacking) until he uses 2 abilities.

name: HK-47
description: Offensive Support with a variety of debuffs and a high chance to self-Revive once

abilities.name: SuperiorFirepower
abilities.description: Deal physical damage to target enemy with a 55% chance to gain Offense Up for 3 turns.

abilities.name: MeatbagMayhem
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 25% chance each to inflict Ability Block, Speed Down, Offense Down, Defense Down, and Damage over Time for 1 turn. These chances are doubled against Jedi.

abilities.name: AssassinProtocol
abilities.description: Droid allies gain 30% Critical Chance and gain 50% Turn Meter on a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Reconstruction
abilities.description: HK-47 has a 75% chance to Revive with 30% Health the first time he is defeated.

name: Stormtrooper Han
description: Versatile tank able to surprise enemies with sudden Turn Meter changes and Offense boosts

abilities.name: WaryShot
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to gain 35% Turn Meter. This attack has high damage variance.

abilities.name: DrawFire
abilities.description: Han Taunts for 3 turns, and all other allies gain 30% Turn Meter. In addition, all other allies gain 20% Turn Meter when Han is damaged while his Taunt is active.

abilities.name: PlanB
abilities.description: All allies gain 40% Defense while above 50% Health and 35% Offense while below 50% Health.

abilities.name: Bluff
abilities.description: Han has a 25% chance to remove 30% Turn Meter from each enemy at the start of each of his turns. In addition, Han recovers 5% Protection and has a 25% chance to remove 10% Turn Meter from each enemy when he is damaged.

name: Poggle the Lesser
description: Support character with strong droid synergies.

abilities.name: Quash
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 60% chance to inflict Ability Block for 2 turns.

abilities.name: DroidAssault
abilities.description: All allies gain Offense Up for 3 turns. In addition, Droid allies gain Speed Up for 3 turns and Poggle the Lesser has a 25% chance to gain 40% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: MachineOverlord
abilities.description: Droid and Geonosian allies gain 30% Offense.

abilities.name: MetalHive
abilities.description: Poggle the Lesser gains 7% Evasion for each living Droid ally and gains 25% Turn Meter whenever he Evades an attack.

name: General Veers
description: Aggressive Empire Support that becomes stronger as enemies are defeated

abilities.name: DaringAttack
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance each to grant Speed Up for 2 turns to General Veers and a random Imperial Trooper ally who doesn't have it.

abilities.name: RuthlessAssault
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies with a 55% chance to inflict Ability Block for 1 turn, dealing 10% more damage for each living Rebel enemy. Call all other Imperial Trooper allies to assist, dealing 40% less damage.

abilities.name: ImperialAssault Commander
abilities.description: Empire allies gain 30% Offense. Imperial Trooper allies gain 20 Speed and gain 10% Turn Meter whenever they gain a buff.

abilities.name: AggressiveTactician
abilities.description: Whenever an enemy is defeated while Veers is active, Imperial Trooper allies gain Offense Up for 2 turns, gain 50% Turn Meter, and recover 10% Protection.While Veers is active, Imperial Trooper allies have +15% Critical Chance.

name: Plo Koon
description: Jedi Tank with Clone synergy, reliable enemy Dispel and anti-Stealth

abilities.name: QuellingBlow
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and dispel a random positive status effect on them, with a 50% chance to dispel all positive status effects instead. If an effect is dispelled, Plo Koon gains Defense Up for 3 turns.

abilities.name: ForceJudgment
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies with a 70% chance to inflict Offense Down for 3 turns.

abilities.name: TakeCharge
abilities.description: All allies gain Defense Up for 4 turns. Clone and Jedi allies gain 50% Turn Meter and other allies gain half that amount.

abilities.name: Overwatch
abilities.description: Each ally has a 55% chance to remove Stealth from each enemy at the start of their turn. If they dispel any enemies, they gain Offense Up for 1 turn.

name: Rey (Scavenger)
description: Risky Attacker that has high damage and evasion, but is vulnerable to debuffs

abilities.name: ShiftingStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 40% chance to gain Foresight for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Leverage
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. In addition, Rey gains Foresight for 2 turns if she doesn't have any positive status effects, and Offense Up for 3 turns if she does.

abilities.name: Flurryof Blows
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy twice, with a 55% chance to deal damage a third time. If Rey has any positive status effects, she will deal damage one additional time. Hits after the first deal reduced damage.

abilities.name: FocusedStrikes
abilities.description: As long as she has no debuffs, Rey has +25% Offense and inflicts Daze for 2 turns whenever she uses a Special ability. This effect can't be Resisted.

name: Aayla Secura
description: Versatile attacker with high survivability through Dodge, Hitpoints, and self healing.

abilities.name: InspiringStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 35% chance to call an ally to Assist. If the assisting ally is a Jedi, they deal 50% more damage.

abilities.name: Survivor
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and recover Health equal to 65% of the damage dealt.

abilities.name: JediValor
abilities.description: Jedi allies gain 40% Tenacity and recover 10% of their Max Health when they ward off an effect.

abilities.name: SuperiorRiposte
abilities.description: Aayla has +10% Critical Chance, 65% Counter Chance and +50% Counter Damage. In addition, she Stuns her target for 1 turn whenever she critically hits.

name: Captain Phasma
description: High-damage First Order support that can grant allies many extra attacks

abilities.name: Onslaught
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to target enemy and inflict Defense Down for 2 turns on a Critical Hit. If this attack is not a Critical Hit, Phasma has a 50% chance to gain Advantage for 2 turns instead.

abilities.name: VictoryMarch
abilities.description: All allies gain 50% Turn Meter and Advantage for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Fusillade
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 90% chance to inflict Speed Down for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Fireat Will
abilities.description: Whenever an ally attacks, they have a 20% chance to call a random ally to Assist. This chance is tripled if the attacking ally is First Order. If that ally had Advantage, they regain it for 2 turns. First Order allies gain Advantage for 2 turns at the start of each encounter, can't be Critically Hit while they have Advantage, and gain 20% Potency.

name: Chopper
description: Surly Phoenix Support who Taunts and Dispels, and can recover Phoenix cooldowns

abilities.name: RecklessFling
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and grant a random Phoenix or Droid ally Offense Up, Defense Up, or Speed Up at random for 2 turns, with a 60% chance to also reduce that ally's cooldowns by 1.

abilities.name: CantankerousClanker
abilities.description: Chopper gains Taunt for 1 turn. While he has this Taunt buff, Chopper gains 30% Evasion.

abilities.name: MetalMenace
abilities.description: Dispel all buffs on target enemy. For each buff dispelled this way, all enemies lose 10% Turn Meter and Chopper gains 25% Protection. Droid targets are also Stunned for 1 turn, which can't be Evaded.

abilities.name: MaintenanceProtocols
abilities.description: At the start of his turn, Chopper recovers 15% of his Max Health. In addition, whenever he is damaged by an attack, he gains Protection Up (15%) if he doesn't have Protection Up. Additionally, Chopper has a 30% Chance to Assist when another Phoenix or Droid ally uses an ability during their turn (this Assist is not shared with Phoenix allies).

name: Jyn Erso
description: Offensive Rebel Leader who gains Advantage, Stuns enemies, revives Rebel allies and grants them Potency Up

abilities.name: Pressthe Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to gain Advantage for 2 turns.

abilities.name: RebelCounterattack
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies and grant target other ally 100% Turn Meter and Advantage for 2 turns. If any Critical Hits are scored, revive a random Rebel ally with 20% Max Health for each Critical Hit scored.

abilities.name: TruncheonStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and remove all Turn Meter. Jyn gains that much Turn Meter. On a Critical Hit, Stun the target for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Intothe Fray
abilities.description: Rebel allies have +35% Potency and recover 5% Protection whenever they gain a buff. Enemies that suffer debuffs during Rebel allies' turns have a 50% chance to also become Exposed for 2 turns. This Expose can't be Resisted.

abilities.name: Fierce Determination
abilities.description: Jyn is immune to Stuns and gains 10% Potency each time she scores a Critical Hit.

name: Qui-Gon Jinn
description: Versatile attacker focused on generating extra attacks.

abilities.name: QuickStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 65% chance to gain 30% Turn Meter and a 65% chance to remove 30% of the target's Turn Meter.

abilities.name: HarmoniousAssault
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy and call an ally to Assist. The Assisting ally deals 75% more damage and recovers 20% of their Max Health.

abilities.name: HumblingBlow
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy and remove all positive status effects. If an effect is dispelled, all allies gain Offense Up for 3 turns.

abilities.name: AgilityTraining
abilities.description: Jedi allies have +30 Speed, gain Offense equal to 3 times their Speed, and gain Foresight for 2 turns at the start of each encounter and whenever any unit is defeated.

name: CT-7567 "Rex"
description: Clone leader with a variety of abilities to support and protect Clone allies.

abilities.name: ImpedingShot
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and remove 25% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: SquadDiscipline
abilities.description: Dispel all negative status effects on all allies and grant them Tenacity Up for 3 turns. Clone allies gain 60% Turn Meter, plus an additional 10% Turn Meter for each effect dispelled this way, and other allies gain half that amount.

abilities.name: Subdue
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy, plus bonus damage equal to 25% of the target's Maximum Health.

abilities.name: Brothersin Arms
abilities.description: Clone allies gain 20% Max Health, and other allies gain half that amount. In addition, whenever an ally suffers a Critical Hit, all Clone allies gain 15% Turn Meter, and other allies gain half that amount.

name: Boba Fett
description: Ruthless Bounty Hunter Attacker who ignores Taunts, Ability Blocks and self-revives

abilities.name: EE-3Carbine
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance (doubled against Scoundrels) to attack again. Each attack has a 70% chance to inflict Damage Over Time for 2 turns.

abilities.name: DeathFrom Above
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies with an 80% chance to inflict Ability Block for 1 turn and a 50% chance to inflict Damage Over Time for 2 turns. Inflict Ability Block on the selected target for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Execute
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and dispel all status effects on them. Deal 30% more damage for each effect dispelled. Enemies defeated by this ability can't be revived. Reduce all cooldowns by 1 on a finishing blow. This attack can't be Evaded.

abilities.name: Deador Alive
abilities.description: All allies gain 50% Critical Damage and 10% Critical Chance. Bounty Hunter allies gain 15 Speed for each debuffed enemy, gain Max Health equal to 50% of the total Potency of all Bounty Hunter allies, and gain 15% Turn Meter whenever a Thermal Detonator explodes.

abilities.name: BountyHunter's Resolve
abilities.description: At the start of battle, and whenever he defeats an enemy, Boba Fett recovers 100% Protection and gains Bounty Hunter's Resolve until he is defeated.Bounty Hunter's Resolve: Boba Fett ignores Taunts during his turn. When defeated, revive at 100% Health. Can't be Dispelled or prevented.

name: General Grievous
description: Brutal Attacker that cuts down defensive enemies while protecting himself with forced ally taunts; although he hates being called a droid, he counts as one in combat.

abilities.name: FuriousAssault
abilities.description: Deal physical damage to target enemy. This attack can't be Evaded or Countered.

abilities.name: GrievousWounds
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 65% chance to inflict Healing Immunity for 1 turn.

abilities.name: SinisterLaugh
abilities.description: Inflict Health Down on all enemies for 2 turns, with a 55% chance to remove 30% Turn Meter. This chance is doubled against Jedi enemies.

abilities.name: DauntingPresence
abilities.description: All enemies have -20% Critical Chance and -20% Critical Damage.

abilities.name: TacticalRetreat
abilities.description: Grievous has +10% Max Health for each living Droid ally. In addition, whenever Grievous falls below 50% Health, he will Dispel all negative status effects on himself and force a random ally to Taunt for 1 turn if no ally is currently Taunting for him. If he does, that ally also gains 100% Turn Meter.

name: Old Daka
description: Defensive Nightsister Healer who Stuns and Revives

abilities.name: InsightfulBlow
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 75% chance to Stun them for 1 turn. Deal Physical damage to a random enemy with a 55% chance to Stun them for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Chantof Resurrection
abilities.description: Revive a random defeated Nightsister ally at 1 Health with a 35% chance (doubled on Nightsisters) to Revive other defeated allies at 1 Health. All allies recover Health equal to 50% of Old Daka's Max Health.

abilities.name: NightsisterElder
abilities.description: Nightsister allies have +50% Health and +50% Defense.

abilities.name: ServeAgain
abilities.description: When another ally is defeated, Old Daka gains 50% Turn Meter and the cooldown of Chant of Resurrection is reduced by 1. When another ally is Revived while Old Daka is active, the Revived ally gains 20% Turn Meter and gains Offense Up and Defense Up for 2 turns, and Old Daka gains +10% Max Health (stacking) until the end of the encounter.

name: Rey (Jedi Training)
description: Resilient Resistance Tank who avenges debuffed allies and controls the battlefield

abilities.name: ConnectedStrikes
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. Damage is increased by 25% for each of the following: Rey has no debuffs; Rey has any buffs; the target has no buffs; the target has any debuffs.

abilities.name: DefiantSlash
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Healing Immunity for 2 turns (this effect can’t be Copied, Dispelled, or Resisted). Target other Resistance ally and dispel all their debuffs, call them to Assist, and grant them Foresight for 2 turns.

abilities.name: MindTrick
abilities.description: Dispel all buffs on target enemy and inflict Ability Block, Daze, Offense Down, and Speed Down for 2 turns. For each debuff inflicted, remove 10% Turn Meter, which can't be Resisted. For each debuff Resisted, remove 20% Turn Meter, which can't be Resisted. For each active Resistance ally, gain 15% Turn Meter. This attack can't be Evaded.

abilities.name: InspirationalPresence
abilities.description: Resistance allies have +30% Critical Chance and +30% Critical Damage. When they score a Critical Hit, they have a 70% chance to inflict Expose for 2 turns (this effect can't be Resisted). Resistance allies gain 10% Turn Meter when an enemy is Exposed.When a Resistance ally uses a Special ability:- All Exposed enemies lose 5% Turn Meter (this effect can't be Resisted)- If the Resistance ally has no debuffs, reduce their Cooldowns by 1

abilities.name: VirtuousProtector
abilities.description: When another ally suffers a debuff, or when another Resistance ally gains Secret Intel, Rey gains 8% Turn Meter. When Rey suffers a debuff, she has a 40% chance to Dispel all debuffs on herself.

abilities.name: Insight
abilities.description: At the start of each encounter, Rey gains Foresight until she Evades. When Rey Evades, she recovers 5% Health and 5% Protection.At the end of Rey's turn:- Rey gains Foresight until she Evades- If Rey has Foresight, she gains Critical Damage Up until she is damaged- If Rey has Critical Damage Up, she gains Offense Up until she is damaged

name: Cassian Andor
description: Rebel Support who buffs allies at the start of battle and debuffs enemies during battle

abilities.name: TwoSteps Ahead
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 85% chance to inflict Buff Immunity for 2 turns.

abilities.name: ShockGrenade
abilities.description: Inflict Ability Block, Defense Down, Healing Immunity, Offense Down, and Speed Down (once each) on random enemies for 2 turns. If the primary target is Empire, Expose them for 2 turns. If K-2SO is present, he is called to Assist. Then, gain 20% Turn Meter for each debuffed enemy.

abilities.name: CripplingShot
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy. For each debuff present on other enemies, inflict that debuff on the target for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Groundwork
abilities.description: At the start of each encounter all Rebel allies gain Protection Up (20%) for 3 turns, all Rebel Attackers gain Defense Up for 3 turns, all Rebel Supports gain Potency Up for 3 turns, and all Rebel Tanks gain Tenacity Up for 3 turns. If K-2SO is present, he gains all of these buffs.

name: Grand Admiral Thrawn
description: Calculating Empire Leader who can halt enemies in their tracks, and grants Empire allies a new Special ability

abilities.name: Manipulate
abilities.description: Characters: Deal Special damage to target enemy, grant them Speed Up for 1 turn, or if they already had Ability Block, inflict Stun for 1 turn instead. When this Speed Up expires, inflict Ability Block for 1 turn. These effects can't be Resisted.Raid Bosses: Deal Special damage to target enemy and inflict Defense Down for 2 turns, which can't be Resisted.

abilities.name: Fracture
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy 4 times, dispel all buffs on them, remove 50% Turn Meter, and inflict Fracture until the start of Thrawn's next turn, or until Thrawn is defeated. This Fracture can't be Copied or Dispelled. This attack can't be Evaded or Resisted.Fracture on Characters: Speed set to 0, can't gain buffs, bonus Attacks, or bonus Turn Meter.Fracture on Raid Bosses: -50% Speed (doesn't stack with Speed Down), can't gain buffs, and -30% Counter Chance

abilities.name: GrandAdmiral's Command
abilities.description: Swap Turn Meter with target other ally. Dispel all debuffs on Thrawn and that ally, and they recover 40% Protection.

abilities.name: LegendaryStrategist
abilities.description: Empire allies have +15% Max Protection, +25% Offense, and gain 20% Turn Meter whenever they Resist a detrimental effect or suffer a debuff. Whenever an Empire ally gains or loses a status effect, they recover 2% Protection. Empire allies gain a new Special ability, Maneuver: Dispel all debuffs on this character and gain 50% Turn Meter (Cooldown 3).

abilities.name: Ebband Flow
abilities.description: Thrawn has +100% Counter Chance, +100% Tenacity, and -50% Speed while any enemies are Fractured. Whenever another Empire ally uses a Special ability while Thrawn is active, that ally gains 15% Turn Meter and, if any enemies are Fractured, Thrawn and Fractured enemies lose 15% Turn Meter.

name: R2-D2
description: Versatile Support Droid that inflicts Burning and grants allies Stealth

abilities.name: ElectroshockProd
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with an 80% chance to Stun for 1 turn. This attack deals 30% more damage to Burning targets.

abilities.name: SmokeScreen
abilities.description: Target ally gains Foresight and Advantage for 2 turns and all other allies gain Stealth for 2 turns. R2-D2 gains 40% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: Improvise
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies and inflict Burning for 3 turns. This attack can't be Evaded.

abilities.name: CombatAnalysis
abilities.description: While R2-D2 is active, all allies gain 10% Critical Chance and 10% Accuracy. While R2-D2 is active, whenever a Light Side ally scores a Critical Hit, dispel all debuffs on them.

abilities.name: NumberCrunch
abilities.description: At the start of battle, R2-D2 gains 10% Max Protection for each Droid ally, 10% Offense for each Galactic Republic ally, 10% Max Health for each Rebel ally, and 10% Potency for each Resistance ally.At the start of battle, and when R2-D2 revives, other Droid, Galactic Republic, Rebel, and Resistance allies gain 10% of R2-D2's Max Protection, Offense, Max Health, and Potency until R2-D2 is defeated.

name: Nute Gunray
description: Attacker with powerful Stealth bonuses and a potent Thermal Detonator

abilities.name: CowardlyShot
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to gain Stealth for 1 turn.

abilities.name: GrenadeToss
abilities.description: Place a Thermal Detonator on target enemy that explodes after 3 turns, dealing damage to the affected target and 60% of that amount to all other enemies.

abilities.name: BackroomSubterfuge
abilities.description: Stealthed allies gain 55% Critical Chance and gain 50% Turn Meter the first time they score a Critical Hit during their turn.

abilities.name: ShrewdTactics
abilities.description: Nute Gunray gains 4% Defense for each living ally, and has 65% Critical Chance while Stealthed.

name: Luminara Unduli
description: Versatile attacker with ability block and powerful party heal.

abilities.name: Flowof the Force
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to gain Evasion Up for 2 turns.

abilities.name: ForceBlast
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Ability Block for 1 turn.

abilities.name: MasterHealer's Blessing
abilities.description: Each ally recovers Health equal to 45% of Luminara Unduli's Max Health, plus an additional 20% of her Max Health on the start of their next 2 turns.

abilities.name: ElegantSteps
abilities.description: Jedi allies gain 15% Evasion and recover Health equal to 8% of Luminara's Max Health at the start of each of their turns. Non-Jedi allies receive half of the Evasion bonus and Heal effect. Whenever any ally gains a buff they do not have, they gain a Heal Over Time effect for 2 turns.

name: Bistan
description: Wild Rebel Attacker who gains Frenzy, debuffs enemies, and removes Turn Meter

abilities.name: Blast'Em
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to inflict Damage Over Time for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.description: Bistan gains Frenzy for 4 turns and all other allies gain 20% Turn Meter.Frenzy: Whenever another ally uses a Special ability, this unit gains 100% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: GunnerTactics
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and remove Turn Meter equal to Bistan's Potency.

abilities.name: AmpedUp
abilities.description: Bistan gains 10% Potency for each Rebel ally and each debuffed enemy.

name: Commander Luke Skywalker
description: Determined Rebel hero who can ignore debuffs or ignore Taunts

abilities.name: DestinedStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Speed Down and Defense Down for 2 turns. If the target already had Speed Down, remove 30% Turn Meter. If the target already had Defense Down, inflict Stun for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Usethe Force
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy, Dispel all buffs on them, remove 100% Turn Meter, and inflict Buff Immunity and Tenacity Down for 2 turns. Reduce the cooldown of this ability by 1 if the target didn't have full Health.

abilities.name: Callto Action
abilities.description: Dispel all debuffs on Luke. Luke gains 100% Turn Meter and recovers 40% Health and 40% Protection. If Luke doesn't have the Call to Action unique buff, he gains it until the next time this ability is used.Call to Action: Luke ignores Taunts during his turn and has +50% Accuracy, +50% Critical Chance, and +50% Critical Damage. Can't be Dispelled or prevented.

abilities.name: RebelManeuvers
abilities.description: Rebel allies have +50% Counter Chance, +50% Defense, and +15% Offense. Whenever an enemy Resists a detrimental effect, Rebel allies gain 5% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: LearnControl
abilities.description: While Luke doesn't have Call to Action, he has +50% Counter Chance, +50% Critical Avoidance, +50% Defense, +100% Tenacity, and gains 10% Turn Meter whenever another Rebel ally takes damage.

abilities.name: ItBinds All Things
abilities.description: Luke has +40% Potency. Whenever Luke Resists a detrimental effect he recovers 5% Health and 5% Protection. Whenever Luke inflicts a debuff he gains 10% Turn Meter and other allies gain half that amount.

name: Wedge Antilles
description: Rebel Attacker with a strong offensive opening

abilities.name: FocusedFire
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Defense Down until the end of Wedge's next turn. This attack deals 50% more damage to targets suffering Defense Down.

abilities.name: RedSquadron Strike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies. This attack deals 50% more damage to Empire enemies or enemies with 50% Health or more.

abilities.name: RebelHeroism
abilities.description: Rebel allies have +30% Offense, recover 15% of their Max Health and 10% Turn Meter on a Critical Hit, and recover 25% of their Max Health whenever they defeat an enemy.

abilities.name: RedLeader
abilities.description: Wedge has +12% Offense and +9 Speed for each ally with full Health and +15 Speed for each ally without full Health (including defeated allies.) If Biggs Darklighter is present he also gains these bonuses.

name: Mother Talzin
description: Vicious Nightsister Leader who inflicts Plague, preventing enemies from Dispelling debuffs

abilities.name: IchorLightning
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy and, if they were Plagued, inflict Plague for 3 turns. Deal Special damage to all Plagued enemies, which can't be Countered.

abilities.name: DarkMagick
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies and inflict Plague for 3 turns. This attack ignores Protection.Plague: Unit loses 5% Health when inflicted and at the start of their turn, is immune to allied Dispels, and loses all stacks of Plague when healed to full Health

abilities.name: SpiritBlade Assault
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy and call all other Nightsister allies to Assist. If any enemies are defeated, all Nightsister allies are Revived and recover 100% Health.

abilities.name: TheGreat Mother
abilities.description: Nightsister allies have +50% Potency and +30 Speed. When a Nightsister ally uses a Special ability, they inflict Plague on the selected target for 3 turns, which can't be Evaded. When an enemy Resists a detrimental effect, Nightsister allies gain 5% Turn Meter. When a Nightsister ally uses a Basic ability during their turn, a random defeated Nightsister ally is Revived with 50% Health and called to Assist, then the Revived ally is immediately defeated unless an enemy was defeated (the Revived ally can't be Revived by this effect again until the end of the next turn).

abilities.name: Plaguebearer
abilities.description: At the start of each enemy turn, if they are Plagued and Talzin is active, they inflict Plague on another random enemy, which can't be Evaded or Resisted. When any unit falls below half health, Talzin gains 35% Turn Meter.

name: CT-5555 "Fives"
description: Tank character with high Defense, enemy speed reduction, and joint attack ability.

abilities.name: DualDC-17 Blasters
abilities.description: Deal physical damage to target enemy and inflict Speed Down for 2 turns. Attack again if enemy is inflicted with Speed Down.

abilities.name: CombinedFire
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and call a random ally to Assist. If the Assisting ally is a Clone, both attackers deal 75% more damage.

abilities.name: VeteranClone Trooper
abilities.description: Clone allies gain 65 Defense, and other allies gain half that amount.

abilities.name: TacticalAwareness
abilities.description: Fives has 85% Counter Chance and +50% Counter Damage. Fives gains 15% Turn Meter whenever another Clone ally takes damage and 7.5% Turn Meter whenever a non-Clone ally takes damage.

name: Ezra Bridger
description: Versatile Phoenix Attacker that can perform a variety of effects based on the Roles of allies

abilities.name: RushingStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 40% chance to attack again. If Ezra has no debuffs, the chance is doubled.

abilities.name: Flourish
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and Dispel all buffs on them. If the enemy had no buffs, this attack's cooldown is reduced by 1 and Ezra gains 75% Turn Meter instead. Ezra gains Defense Up for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Watchand Learn
abilities.description: Target ally attacks and then Ezra assists them, dealing 20% more damage. Both attackers gain a bonus effect based on the chosen ally's role:- Attacker: +100% Crit for this attack- Tank: Protection Up (40%) for 2 turns- Support: +40% Turn Meter Gain

abilities.name: PushThrough
abilities.description: Ezra gains 10% Offense at the end of his turn. The effect can stack up to 40%. This bonus is reset when Ezra is defeated.

name: Gar Saxon
description: Leader who grants Empire allies Counter Chance and Assists them when they Counter Attack

abilities.name: Onthe Hunt
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to inflict Speed Down for 2 turns. If the target already had Speed Down, reduce Gar Saxon's cooldowns by 1.

abilities.name: CalculatedAmbush
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies, dealing double damage to enemies with less than 50% Turn Meter. Enemies that had at least 50% Turn Meter lose 30% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: MandalorianRetaliation
abilities.description: Empire allies gain 50% Counter Chance and 40% Defense. Whenever an Empire ally uses a Basic attack, they recover 5% Health

abilities.name: Viceroy'sVengeance
abilities.description: Whenever another ally attacks during an enemy turn, Gar Saxon has a 100% chance to Assist.

name: Sabine Wren
description: Aggressive Phoenix Attacker that permanently strips Defense and punishes slower enemies

abilities.name: BlastersAkimbo
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy twice. This attack scores an additional hit for each of the following if the target:- Has less than 70% Turn Meter- Has less than 30% Turn Meter- The target is debuffedHits after the first deal 75% less damage.

abilities.name: DarksaberStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict the Armor Shred unique effect for the rest of the battle. Armor Shred isn't a debuff, and it can't be Resisted or Dispelled. In addition, its effects stack, but are halved against units with the Fearsome Foe ability.(Armor Shred: -50% Defense per stack, can't be Dispelled, not a debuff)

abilities.name: Demolish
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies, Stagger them for 2 turns, and Expose target enemy for 2 turns. For each active Phoenix ally, deal +15% more damage and Expose a random enemy. Phoenix allies gain Critical Chance Up and Offense Up for 2 turns. If this attack scores a Critical Hit, reduce Sabine's cooldowns by 2. This attack can't be Countered or Evaded.

abilities.name: TakeIt Back
abilities.description: Sabine has +25% Critical Chance and +25% Critical Damage.

name: Ima-Gun Di
description: Supportive Tank that boost ally defense and grants Jedi allies Counter Chance

abilities.name: Sunder
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to inflict Defense Down for 2 turns. If the target is a Droid, this attack deals 100% more damage and has a 100% chance to inflict Defense Down.

abilities.name: Rebuke
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and grant all allies Defense Up for 3 turns.

abilities.name: JediStrategist
abilities.description: All allies gain 30 Defense and Jedi allies gain 35% Counter Chance and 25% Counter Damage.

abilities.name: LastStand
abilities.description: Ima-Gun Di recovers 15% of his Max Health each turn for 3 turns whenever he suffers a Critical Hit.

name: Bodhi Rook
description: Clever Rebel Support who spots enemy units for his allies

abilities.name: CallTargets
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Evasion Down for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Spotter
abilities.description: Inflict target enemy with Evasion Down for 2 turns, which can't be Evaded. Target other ally gains Offense Up and Potency Up for 2 turns and is called to Assist. If the target ally is a Rebel, Bodhi gains 30% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: InterceptCommunications
abilities.description: Remove 10% Turn Meter from all enemies (doubled on Empire enemies) which can't be Evaded. All allies gain 10% Turn Meter (doubled on Rebel allies).

abilities.name: DoubleDuty
abilities.description: While Bodhi is active, Rebel allies with Offense Up also gain +50% Defense. At the end of each of his turns, Bodhi grants Offense Up for 2 turns to a random ally who doesn't have it.

name: Darth Vader
description: Fearsome Attacker that applies AoE Damage Over Time, and crushes debuffed targets for extra turns

abilities.name: TerrifyingSwing
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with an 80% chance to inflict Ability Block for 1 turn. Jedi targets cannot Evade or Resist the effects of this attack.

abilities.name: ForceCrush
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies and inflict Speed Down and 3 Damage Over Time effects for 2 rounds.

abilities.name: CullingBlade
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and dispels all debuffs on them. This attack deals 50% more damage for each effect dispelled and grants 100% Turn Meter on a finishing blow. This attack can't be Evaded.

abilities.name: InspiringThrough Fear
abilities.description: Empire and Sith allies gain 30% Offense and have a 50% chance to remove 20% Turn Meter when they damage an enemy. This Turn Meter removal can't be Resisted. While Darth Vader is alive, enemies immediately regain Damage Over Time for 2 turns whenever Damage Over Time expires on them.

name: Kit Fisto
description: Versatile Jedi Attacker with multi-attack, Counter Chance, and a variety of ally buffs

abilities.name: LightsaberMastery
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 30% chance to attack again. Kit Fisto has a 50% chance to gain 15% Turn Meter with each attack.

abilities.name: Turnthe Tide
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies and grant all allies Potency Up for 3 turns.

abilities.name: JediProtector
abilities.description: All allies gain 25% Tenacity and Jedi allies gain 45 Defense.

abilities.name: SuperiorBladework
abilities.description: Kit Fisto has 35% Counter Chance and +20% Offense.

name: Hera Syndulla
description: Cunning Phoenix Support that allows Phoenix allies to share their Unique abilities with each other

abilities.name: Outwit
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If that enemy was the healthiest enemy, also Expose them for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Playto Strengths
abilities.description: Call another target ally to Assist. That ally's attack has +50% Potency and deals 35% more damage. If target ally is Phoenix, Dispel all debuffs on them, reduce their cooldowns by 1, and grant them 50% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: BackupPlan
abilities.description: Target other ally gains the Backup Plan buff for 3 turns.(Backup Plan: Recover 10% Health per turn, Revive with 80% Health and 30% Turn Meter when defeated. Can't be Dispelled or prevented.)

abilities.name: RiseTogether
abilities.description: Each active Phoenix ally grants their Unique ability to other Phoenix allies. In addition, whenever a Phoenix ally uses a special ability, they gain 20% Turn Meter if Hera is active. This effect is doubled for Phoenix allies with less than full Health.

name: Ewok Elder
description: Ewok Healer that specializes in Revives

abilities.name: GuidingStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 60% chance to gain 50% Turn Meter, grant other Ewok allies half that amount, and grant other allies 10% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: TribalHealer
abilities.description: Dispel all debuffs on all allies. All allies recover Health equal to 30% of Ewok Elder's Max Health with a 35% chance to revive defeated allies at 15% Health.

abilities.name: Powerof the Forest
abilities.description: Revive a random defeated ally at 40% Health with a 55% chance for Ewok Elder to gain 45% Turn Meter. If the revived ally is an Ewok, they are called to Assist. Whenever an Ewok ally is defeated, reduce the cooldown of this ability by 1.

name: Talia
description: Aggressive Healer that sacrifices Health so allies can recover Health and Turn Meter

abilities.name: DrainingStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy, dealing +50% damage if Talia is below full Health. Nightsister allies recover Health equal to the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Waterof Life
abilities.description: Dispel all debuffs on Nightsister allies. Talia consumes 20% of her Max Health and gains 15% Turn Meter for each active Nightsister ally. Other allies recover 50% Health and gain 30% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: HarrowingAssault
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy and inflict Damage Over Time and Stagger for 2 turns. If Talia has full Health, consume 10% of her Max Health to deal double damage, otherwise she immediately uses Draining Strike.

abilities.name: NightsisterNimbleness
abilities.description: Nightsister allies gain 16% Evasion and other allies gain half that amount. When an ally evades they have a 50% chance to recover 5% of their Max Health.

name: Geonosian Spy
description: Stealthy Geonosian attacker that can dispel status effects to deal massive damage.

abilities.name: Feint
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to gain Critical Chance Up for 3 turns. This chance is doubled if this attack does not score a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: SilentStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If they have a positive status effect, Dispel all status effects on Geonosian Spy and the target and deal 40% more damage for each effect Dispelled. Otherwise, inflict Evasion Down for 2 turns. This attack can't be Evaded.

abilities.name: IllicitInsect
abilities.description: Geonosian Spy gains Stealth for 3 turns at the start of each encounter and whenever he scores a Critical Hit. Whenever a Geonosian ally inflicts a negative status effect, Geonosian Spy gains 70% Turn Meter.

name: Captain Han Solo
description: Daring Rebel Support that risks himself to Revive allies and Daze enemies

abilities.name: DisablingShot
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Daze for 2 turns. Empire targets can't Resist or Evade and take double damage from this attack. If Han has full health, gain 30% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: HunkerDown
abilities.description: Dispel all debuffs on Han and target other ally, and they both recover Health equal to 40% of Han's Max Health and gain 25% Turn Meter. Then, if the target ally has full Health, they also recover 20% Protection.This ability's cooldown is reduced by 1 whenever an ally suffers a debuff.

abilities.name: Searchand Rescue
abilities.description: Revive a random defeated ally at 1% Health and 0% Turn Meter. If that ally is a Rebel, they recover 50% Health and gain 50% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: Nickof Time
abilities.description: Captain Han Solo has +15% Critical Chance and +30% Critical Damage. In addition, at the end of his turn, Han recovers Health equal to 10% of his Max Health. If Han already has full Health, the least healthy ally is healed instead. Whenever Han uses his Basic attack he gains +10% Max Health (stacking) for 3 turns.

name: General Kenobi
description: Vigorous Jedi Tank who gains Foresight, dispels debuffs to grant buffs, and calls buffed allies to Assist

abilities.name: IntuitiveStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 75% chance to grant Foresight to a random ally that doesn't have it for 2 turns. If all allies are buffed, deal double damage.

abilities.name: TheNegotiator
abilities.description: Dispel all debuffs from all allies and grant them the opposite buffs for 2 turns, if any. All allies that were not debuffed gain Retribution for 2 turns. General Kenobi gains 50% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: Leadthe Charge
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy, grant a random other ally Offense Up for 2 turns, then call all buffed other allies to Assist, dealing 30% less damage.

abilities.name: 212thAttack Battalion Commander
abilities.description: Jedi and Clone allies gain 30% Max Health and 70% Defense. After a Jedi ally uses a team healing Special ability, all other allies at full health are called to Assist, dealing 50% less damage. When a Clone ally uses a Special ability they gain a buff (Attacker: Advantage, Support: Stealth, Tank: Taunt) for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Soresu
abilities.description: At the end of each of his turns, General Kenobi has a 65% chance to gain Foresight for 2 turns.Whenever another ally is Critically Hit, if General Kenobi is alive, they gain Critical Hit Immunity for 1 turn and General Kenobi gains Taunt for 1 turn.

name: Grand Moff Tarkin
description: Offensive Empire Support with crushing AoE debuffs

abilities.name: GrandMoff's Attack
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to one target. This attack deals 10% more damage for each living ally. Tarkin gains 50% Potency (stacking) until the next time Ultimate Firepower is used.

abilities.name: UltimateFirepower
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies with a 100% chance to remove 50% of their Turn Meter. This attack gains Offense equal to double Tarkin's Potency percentage

abilities.name: IntimidationTactics
abilities.description: Gain Potency Up for 3 turns then inflict Critical Chance Down and Offense Down for 3 turns on all enemies. Rebel enemies can't Resist these debuffs. Then gain 15% Turn Meter for each debuffed enemy.

abilities.name: Tightenthe Grip
abilities.description: Empire allies gain 30 Speed. Inflict Defense Down and Expose for 2 turns on enemies that fall below 100% Health during Empire allies' turn. This effect can't be Resisted.

abilities.name: CallousConviction
abilities.description: Grand Moff Tarkin gains Defense equal to his Potency Percentage and 20% Potency per debuffed enemy.

name: Dathcha
description: Versatile Support able to Ability Block and Stealth, effective against Droids or with Jawas

abilities.name: Hitand Run
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 60% chance to gain Stealth for 2 turns.

abilities.name: ScoutInstincts
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies with a 50% chance to inflict Ability Block for 1 turn and a 50% chance to Stun Droids for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Decommission
abilities.description: Whenever an ally damages a Droid, they have an 80% chance to inflict Defense Down for 3 turns and a 25% chance to remove 25% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: DroidHunter
abilities.description: Dathcha gains 4.5% Critical Chance for each living Jawa ally. In addition, he has +15% Critical Damage.

name: Ahsoka Tano
description: Versatile Attacker with healing and superior stats as long as she can avoid suffering Critical Hits

abilities.name: EnergeticSlash
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and Ahsoka recovers Health equal to 20% of her Max Health, increased to 30% on a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: ProtectiveManeuver
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If the target had 50% Health or more, all allies recover Health equal to 30% of Ahsoka's Max Health; otherwise, this attack deals 50% more damage.

abilities.name: QuickSteps
abilities.description: Jedi and Nightsister allies have +14% Evasion, and gain 20% Turn Meter whenever they Evade.

abilities.name: DaringPadawan
abilities.description: Ahsoka has +45% Health, +45 Speed, and +15% Critical Chance. When Critically Hit, she loses one effect. When she defeats an enemy, she regains all of them.If Jedi Knight Anakin is present, Ahsoka gains Critical Hit Immunity for 2 turns at the start of each encounter and whenever she uses a Special ability.

name: Chirrut Îmwe
description: Balanced Rebel Attacker who dispels debuffs, heals allies, and grants Tenacity Up

abilities.name: StaffStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to gain Heal Over Time for 3 turns. If the target is debuffed, grant Heal Over Time to a random ally for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Asthe Force Wills
abilities.description: All allies have their current Health percentages equalized. Dispel all debuffs from all allies and grant them a Heal Over Time effect for 4 turns for each effect dispelled. Allies that were not debuffed gain Tenacity Up for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Strengthof Purpose
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy, dealing 20% more damage for each buffed ally. If Baze Malbus is present, he is called to Assist.

abilities.name: IndomitableWill
abilities.description: Chirrut Îmwe gains +17% Counter Chance and Health Steal for each living enemy, doubled for Empire enemies. If Baze Malbus is present he also gains these bonuses.

abilities.name: ResoluteEndurance
abilities.description: Whenever a Rebel ally is Critically Hit they gain Heal Over Time for 2 turns. At the start of each turn, if Chirrut Îmwe is alive, all allies with Heal Over Time recover 4% of their Max Health.

name: Teebo
description: Ewok stealth character with stealth synergies and some control ability.

abilities.name: StealthTakedown
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If Teebo is Stealthed, also remove 100% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: EwokScramble Tactics
abilities.description: Ewok allies gain 100% Turn Meter and Teebo gains Stealth for 3 turns. Other Ewok allies also have a 30% chance to gain Stealth for 2 turns.

abilities.name: BringLow
abilities.description: Deal unavoidable Physical damage to target enemy and dispel all buffs on them. If any buffs are dispelled, remove 60% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: GuerrillaWarfare
abilities.description: Allies have a 55% chance to gain Stealth for 1 turn at the beginning of their turns and a 50% chance to gain 25% Turn Meter at the end of their turns.

name: Kylo Ren (Unmasked)
description: Tough First Order Tank with a powerful Stun

abilities.name: AggressiveStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Tenacity Down for 2 turns. If the target was already debuffed, and it is Kylo's turn, he gains Taunt for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Halt
abilities.description: Dispel all buffs on target enemy and Stun them for 2 turns. Kylo recovers 10% Health and gains Taunt for 1 turn. This attack can't be Evaded or Resisted.

abilities.name: FocusedRage
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and recover Health equal to the damage dealt. If the target is Stunned, deal double damage.

abilities.name: MercilessPursuit
abilities.description: First Order allies have +40% Critical Damage and +30 Speed. When a First Order ally scores a Critical Hit, they gain 20% Turn Meter. When a First Order ally gains a status effect, they recover 5% Health and 5% Protection.

abilities.name: Scarred
abilities.description: When Kylo takes damage, he recovers 8% Health and a random First Order ally who doesn't have it gains Advantage for 2 turns. Kylo has +50% Counter Chance, doubled while he has Taunt. Kylo takes reduced damage from Percent Health damage effects and gains Taunt for 1 turn at the start of each encounter.

name: Rebel Officer Leia Organa
description: Tenacious Rebel Attacker that counters debuffs and is more effective against healthy targets

abilities.name: HoldOff
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Buff Immunity for 2 turns. Leia gains 10% Turn Meter, an additional 10% Turn Meter if the target had full Health, and an additional 10% Turn Meter if the target is Empire.

abilities.name: RebelBarrage
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage 10 times to random enemy targets. Enemies struck more than once suffer Ability Block for 1 turn. This ability's cooldown is reduced by 1 whenever Leia scores a Critical Hit or suffers a debuff. These attacks can't be Countered.

abilities.name: BattlefrontCommand
abilities.description: Rebel allies have +20% Tenacity and 20% Critical Chance. Whenever a Rebel ally takes damage from an Empire enemy they have a 50% chance to gain Foresight for 2 turns. The first time each turn a Rebel ally Resists a detrimental effect or suffers a debuff, they gain 30% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: Dauntless
abilities.description: Leia has +10% Offense and +40% Tenacity. The first time each turn Leia Resists a detrimental effect or suffers a debuff she gains 15% Turn Meter and gains 35% Offense (stacking) until the end of her next turn.

name: Count Dooku
description: High-damage attacker with stun, bonus attacks, and incredible counter-attacking.

abilities.name: HinderingPress
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to attack again. These attacks have a 25% chance to Stun for 1 turn and a 25% chance to inflict Ability Block for 1 turn. Debuff chances doubled against Jedi. This attack can't be Countered.

abilities.name: ForceLightning
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to Shock and Stun them for 1 turn, and a 50% chance to Stun a random enemy. Debuff chances doubled against Jedi.

abilities.name: MasterTactician
abilities.description: All allies gain 15% Evasion and gain Offense Up for 2 turns whenever they evade.

abilities.name: FlawlessRiposte
abilities.description: Count Dooku has 100% Counter Chance. In addition, whenever he attacks outside of his turn, he deals 30% more damage, has a 25% chance to gain 45% Turn Meter, recovers 10% Protection, and gains Critical Hit Immunity for 1 turn.

name: Jedi Knight Anakin
description: High-pressure Jedi attacker that punishes enemies for wounding his allies

abilities.name: DeftBladework
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to inflict Healing and Buff Immunity for 2 turns.

abilities.name: RecklessAssault
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies. For each enemy Critically Hit, 25% chance for all allies to gain Offense Up for 2 turns. For each enemy not Critically Hit, 20% chance for Anakin to become Exposed for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Alwayson the Offensive
abilities.description: Jedi and Clone allies gain 30% Offense and 20% Critical Damage and other allies gain half that amount. Whenever an ally is Evaded, they gain Advantage for 2 turns.

abilities.name: RighteousFury
abilities.description: Whenever another ally falls below 50% health or is defeated, Anakin gains 100% Turn Meter and his next attack deals 75% more damage.

name: CT-21-0408 "Echo"
description: Clone Support that automatically Assists allies and can Dispel all enemies

abilities.name: SupportingFire
