abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and grant 20% Turn Meter to another random ally with less than 50% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: EMPGrenade
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies and Dispel all positive status effects on them.

abilities.name: Bythe Book
abilities.description: Clone allies recover 7% of their Max Health whenever they use a Basic ability. This effect can't trigger more than two times before their next turn, and is disabled if Echo is defeated.

abilities.name: Follow-Up
abilities.description: Whenever another ally uses a Basic ability during their turn, Echo has a 30% chance to Assist, dealing 40% less damage. This Assist chance is doubled if the attacking ally is a Clone.

name: Clone Wars Chewbacca
description: Durable Tank with both Taunt and self-Healing

abilities.name: Bowcaster
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 55% chance to remove 50% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: WookieeRage
abilities.description: Chewbacca Taunts and gains 30% Health Up for 2 turns.

abilities.name: DefiantRoar
abilities.description: Chewbacca dispels all debuffs from himself, recovers 50% of his Max Health, gains Defense Up for 3 Turns, and has a 50% Chance to gain 25% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: WookieeResolve
abilities.description: All allies have +50 Defense, and a 50% chance to gain Defense Up for 3 turns whenever they are damaged.

name: Darth Sidious
description: Brutal Attacker effective against Healers and Jedi while boosting allied Criticals as a Leader

abilities.name: Deathstroke
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Healing Immunity for 3 turns with a 50% chance (doubled if the target is debuffed) to ignore Defense.

abilities.name: DemoralizingBlows
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies and inflict Damage Over Time and Expose for 2 turns. This attack inflicts two additional Damage Over Time effects on a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: UnlimitedPower
abilities.description: All allies gain 15% Critical Chance and 30% Critical Damage. Sith allies gain 2% Offense until the end of battle when they score a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: SadisticGlee
abilities.description: Darth Sidious recovers 20% of his Max Health and gains 50% Turn Meter whenever any unit is defeated. In addition, he has +35% Evasion against Jedi attacks, +50% Potency, and gains Max Health equal to his Potency percentage.

name: Asajj Ventress
description: Nightsister controller with healing who generates attack power as characters are defeated

abilities.name: CruelStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to Stun for 1 turn.

abilities.name: StrikeFear
abilities.description: Dispel all buffs on all enemies and Nightsister allies recover 40% Health. For each buff dispelled, that enemy has a 50% chance to lose 20% Turn Meter and Nightsister allies recover 10% Health. This attack can't be Evaded or Resisted.

abilities.name: EndlessWrath
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies and inflict Defense Down for 2 turns. Refresh all cooldowns on a finishing blow.

abilities.name: NightsisterSwiftness
abilities.description: Nightsister allies have +30 Speed, +30% Offense, gain 50% Turn Meter when they fall below 100% Health, and have a 50% chance to remove 20% Turn Meter when they damage an enemy. This Turn Meter removal can't be Resisted.

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.description: When any ally or enemy is defeated, Asajj gains 35% Turn Meter, and, gains 15% Offense, 15% Critical Chance, and 5% Max Health (stacking) until the end of the encounter. Asajj has +15 Speed for each enemy with no buffs.

name: Finn
description: Resistance tank that keeps the pressure up with a balance between offense and defense

abilities.name: CrackShot
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. This attack deals 100% more damage to enemies that haven't already been struck by it.

abilities.name: Holdthe Line
abilities.description: Finn gains Advantage and Defense Up for 2 turns and Dispels all debuffs from all allies. Finn and Poe Dameron gain Heal Over Time (20%) for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Takedown
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and Expose them for 2 turns with an 80% chance to Stun them for 1 turn.

abilities.name: BalancedTactics
abilities.description: Resistance allies gain 30% Offense and 60% Defense, and other allies gain half that amount. Whenever a Resistance ally loses Foresight, they gain Advantage for 2 turns and whenever an enemy takes damage from Expose, reduce the cooldowns of all Resistance allies by 1 and grant them 35% Turn Meter.

name: Geonosian Soldier
description: Aggressive Attacker that calls Assists and works extremely well with Geonosians

abilities.name: AggressiveAdvance
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 55% chance to gain Offense Up for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and call an Assist. If the Assist is a Geonosian Character then provide a damage bonus to both attackers.

abilities.name: HiveTactics
abilities.description: Geonosian allies gain 9% Critical Chance. Geonosian Soldier gains 50% Turn Meter when scoring a Critical Hit.

name: Garazeb "Zeb" Orrelios
description: Versatile Phoenix Tank with wide variety of effects for allies or enemies with or without debuffs

abilities.name: Bash
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and Daze them for 2 turns. If that enemy was already Dazed, Staggered, or Exposed, they are Stunned for 1 turn instead. This attack deals 30% more damage to debuffed enemies.

abilities.name: StaggeringSweep
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and Stagger them for 1 turn. Zeb gains 10% Turn Meter for each active Phoenix ally. If the target has no debuffs, this attack can't be Resisted, deals double damage, and deals bonus damage equal to 20% of the enemy's Max Health. If the target has any buffs, ignore their Armor. If the target has any debuffs, this attack has +50% Critical Damage. This attack can't be Evaded.

abilities.name: HonorGuard
abilities.description: Zeb and target ally gain Protection Up (50%) for 2 turns. Both gain Tenacity Up for 2 turns if they have no debuffs and Retribution for 2 turns if they do.

abilities.name: ShrugOff
abilities.description: Zeb has bonus Max Protection equal to +40% of his Max Health and recovers 15% Protection at the start of his turn. This recovery is doubled if Zeb is debuffed.

name: Mace Windu
description: Aggressive Jedi tank with devastating damage if left unchecked

abilities.name: InvincibleAssault
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If Mace is above 50% Health, this attack deals 50% more damage. If Mace is below 50% Health, he recovers Health equal to 70% of the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy and remove all positive status effects.

abilities.name: Vaapad
abilities.description: Jedi allies gain 20% Offense and 9% Critical Chance, and they recover 5% of their Max Health when scoring a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Shatterpoint
abilities.description: At the start of each of his turns, Mace has a 45% chance to Expose a random enemy until the end of his turn. This effect can't be Resisted. In addition, Mace gains 25% Turn Meter whenever he attacks an Exposed enemy.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi (Old Ben)
description: Durable Jedi Tank able to shut down enemy offense with multiple debuffs

abilities.name: ElegantForm
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy, inflict Evasion Down for 2 turns, then gain Potency Up for 2 turns. This attack can't be Evaded.

abilities.name: MindTricks
abilities.description: Inflict Ability Block on all enemies for 1 turn and Offense Down for 2 turns, with an 80% chance to remove 60% Turn Meter. Jedi and Rebel allies gain 3% Turn Meter for each effect Resisted. This attack can't be Evaded.

abilities.name: DevotedProtector
abilities.description: Old Ben gains Taunt for 2 turns. When this Taunt expires, Old Ben gains Taunt for 1 turn. All allies gain Defense Up for 2 turns.

abilities.name: OldJedi Knight
abilities.description: All allies gain 15% Evasion and gain 30% Turn Meter whenever they Evade an attack.

abilities.name: IfYou Strike Me Down
abilities.description: Whenever another Jedi or Rebel ally takes damage, Old Ben gains 5% Turn Meter. The first time Old Ben is defeated, all allies gain Offense Up and Speed Up for 2 turns, recover 50% Health and 50% Protection, and gain 25% Turn Meter.

name: Barriss Offee
description: Jedi Healer that can balance party Health and Dispel allied Jedi frequently

abilities.name: InvigoratingStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 45% chance for all allies to recover 6% of Barriss Offee's Max Health.

abilities.name: ForceHealer
abilities.description: All allies have their current Health percentages equalized. (Health equalizing effects ignore Healing Immunity.) Then, each ally recovers 15% of their Max Health and gains Defense Up for 2 turns.

abilities.name: NoOne Left Behind
abilities.description: Jedi allies gain 20% Max Health, and other allies gain half that amount. In addition, at the start of each of their turns, Jedi allies heal for 8% of Barriss Offee's Max Health, and other allies heal half that amount.

abilities.name: SwiftRecovery
abilities.description: At the end of each of her turns, Barriss Dispels all debuffs from the debuffed ally with the lowest Health and gains 10% Turn Meter for each effect removed.Whenever an ally is Critically Hit, that ally recovers 20% of their Max Health and Barriss gains 10% Turn Meter. This effect is disabled while Barriss is defeated.

name: Veteran Smuggler Han Solo
description: Scoundrel Attacker with multi-attack and multiple devastating debuffs

abilities.name: Trueshot
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with 50% chance to attack again. The chance is doubled if the target is debuffed. Han inflicts Stagger for 2 turns when he attacks again.

abilities.name: CanI Try That?
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies. Stun the primary target for 1 turn with 80% chance to inflict Ability Block on all enemies for 1 turn.

abilities.name: PartnerIn Crime
abilities.description: Han has +25% Critical Chance and +50% Health Steal. When Veteran Smuggler Chewbacca takes damage, Han gains 20% Critical Damage (stacking) until he scores a Critical Hit. When Veteran Smuggler Chewbacca is defeated, Han gains 100% Turn Meter, his cooldowns are reset, and he takes an additional turn after his next turn.

abilities.name: Swindle
abilities.description: When an enemy gains a buff, Han gains 25% Counter Chance (stacking) until the end of his next turn. When Han gains a debuff, he gains 50% Defense (stacking) until the end of his next turn. When Han gains any status effect, he gains 50 Armor Penetration (stacking) until the end of his next turn.

name: Chief Chirpa
description: Ewok Leader that greatly improves ally Basic abilities

abilities.name: BoundingStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. In addition, Chirpa gains 35% Turn Meter if that enemy had more than 50% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: AncestralSecrets
abilities.description: All allies recover 20% of their Max Health and gain Heal Over Time (20%) for 3 turns. Ewok allies also gain Retribution for 2 turns and Heal Over Time for 1 additional turn.

abilities.name: TribalUnity
abilities.description: Grant all allies Speed Up for 2 turns, then call all Ewok allies and one other random ally to Assist.

abilities.name: SimpleTactics
abilities.description: Ewok allies gain 20% Turn Meter and deal 10% more damage whenever they perform a Basic attack. These effects are halved for other allies. Whenever an Ewok ally uses a Special ability, 60% chance to call another random Ewok ally to Assist.

name: Zam Wesell
description: Lightning fast Scoundrel attacker that inflicts Evasion Down and detonates bombs.

abilities.name: DetonatingShot
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. All Thermal Detonators on the target explode, dealing damage immediately. If any Thermal Detonators explode, Zam gains 20% Turn Meter for each living Scoundrel ally.

abilities.name: SeeWhat Sticks
abilities.description: Place Thermal Detonators on all enemies that explode after 2 Turns with a 70% chance for Zam to gain Speed Up for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Electro-goggles
abilities.description: Inflict Evasion Down on all enemies for 4 turns and Expose the primary target for 2 turns with a 50% chance to gain 50% Turn Meter. This attack can't be Evaded.

abilities.name: Shapeshifter
abilities.description: Zam gains 18% Evasion. This bonus is doubled while she is suffering a negative status effect. Whenever Zam Evades an attack, she also dispels all negative status effects on herself. Whenever Zam is Critically Hit, she gains Evasion Up for 2 turns.

name: Sith Trooper
description: Sith Tank who Taunts and ignores enemy Protection

abilities.name: DisruptorBlast
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to inflict Defense Down for 3 turns. If the target was already debuffed, ignore their Protection.

abilities.name: CrimsonBarrage
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 70% chance to inflict Offense Down for 2 turns. Then gain Protection Up equal to 5% for each debuffed enemy for 2 turns. This attack ignores Protection.

abilities.name: Vaiken'sLegacy
abilities.description: Sith Trooper has +100% Defense. Whenever a Sith ally uses a Special ability or falls below 50% Health, Sith Trooper gains Defense Up for 2 turns. If he already had Defense Up, he gains Taunt for 2 turns. If he already had Taunt, he gains Retribution for 2 turns. Sith Trooper gains Defense Up for 2 turns at the start of each encounter.

name: Stormtrooper
description: Empire Tank that can Taunt and surprise enemies with unpredictable damage

abilities.name: ImperialMarksmanship
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. This attack has high damage variance. If this attack does not score a Critical Hit, or is Evaded, the target becomes Exposed, which can't be Resisted.

abilities.name: StormtrooperBravado
abilities.description: Taunt for 3 turns and grant Empire allies Defense Up for 3 turns. In addition, Stormtrooper removes 10% Turn Meter from each enemy whenever he is damaged while Taunting.

abilities.name: Wallof Stormtroopers
abilities.description: Stormtrooper gains 40% Defense for each living Empire ally and 40% Offense for each defeated Empire ally.While Stormtrooper is active, Imperial Trooper allies have +30% Defense.

name: Luke Skywalker (Farmboy)
description: Attacker that can boost his own Critical Rate, then disable enemies with Critical Hits

abilities.name: FrontierMarksmanship
abilities.description: Deal Physical Damage to target enemy. If this attack scores a Critical Hit, gain 40% Turn Meter and inflict Damage Over Time for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Bullseye
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Defense Down and Speed Down for 2 turns. If this attack scores a Critical Hit, Stun the target for 1 turn. Otherwise, dispel all buffs on the target.

abilities.name: ANew Hope
abilities.description: All allies gain 50% Tenacity. Whenever an ally Resists a detrimental effect they gain Advantage for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Drawa Bead
abilities.description: Luke has 25% Critical Chance. At the start of each of his turns, Luke gains 10% Critical Damage (stacking) until the end of the encounter.

name: Dengar
description: Adaptable Scoundrel attacker that Stuns and inflicts Tenacity Down.

abilities.name: TargetSpotted
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If the target is suffering from any debuffs, there is a 60% chance to call an Ally to assist. If the assisting ally is a Scoundrel, the attack is guaranteed to be a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Blast& Smash

Effects inflicted depend on number of Critical Hits scored.1 Critical Hit: Tenacity Down for 3 turns2 Critical Hits: Damage Over Time for 3 turns3 Critical Hits: 50% Turn Meter Reduction

name: Cad Bane

abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and Dispel all buffs on them with a 50% chance of inflicting Speed Down for 2 turns. This ability's cooldown is reduced by 2 if the target is suffering any negative status effects.

abilities.name: GuerillaTactics
abilities.description: Resistance Trooper has +10% Potency and gains 55% Turn Meter when an enemy who is not Exposed becomes Exposed.

name: Jedi Consular
description: Well-rounded Jedi Healer with a mix of offense and defense

abilities.name: SaberStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to reduce Jedi Consular's Cooldowns by 1.

abilities.name: JediHealing
abilities.description: Each ally recovers Health equal to 40% of Jedi Consular's Max Health, with a 50% chance of granting Jedi Consular 25% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: Attackas Defense
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy and recover Health equal to 30% of the damage dealt. This attack has a 50% chance to ignore the target's Armor.

name: Jedi Knight Guardian
description: Tenacious Jedi tank with crippling debuffs and natural recovery at low Health

abilities.name: SaberSweep
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 55% chance of inflicting Offense Down for 2 turns.

abilities.name: SaberThrow
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 55% chance to inflict Ability Block for 1 turn. This chance is increased to 100% on a Critical Hit. In addition, Jedi Knight Guardian gains Defense Up for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Defendthe Order
abilities.description: While below 50% Health, Jedi Knight Guardian has +30% Tenacity and recovers 15% of her Max Health at the start of each of her turns.

name: Clone Sergeant - Phase I
description: Clone Attacker with AoE damage and Turn Meter Reduction

abilities.name: Z-6Rotary Blaster
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and gain 50% Turn Meter on a critical hit.

abilities.name: SuppressiveFire
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies and remove 50% of their Turn Meters.

abilities.name: ConcentratedFire
abilities.description: Clone Sergeant Phase I gains 4.5% Critical Chance Up for each living Clone ally. In addition, he has +10% Critical Damage and Offense Up for 2 turns whenever he critically hits.

name: B2 Super Battle Droid
description: Droid Tank that relentlessly punishes enemies that evade attacks or damage allies

abilities.name: HeavyArms
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Evasion Down for 2 turns.

abilities.name: MowDown
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies and Dispel all positive status effects on them, with a 65% chance to also inflict Buff Immunity for 2 turns (applied before damage.)

abilities.name: RelentlessBarrage
abilities.description: B2 has a 40% chance to gain 100% Turn Meter whenever another ally is Evaded or damaged by an attack.

name: Scarif Rebel Pathfinder
description: Steadfast Rebel Tank who debuffs, Taunts, and self-revives

abilities.name: DigIn
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to gain Offense Up for 2 turns. All other allies gain 15% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: ExplosiveEntry
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 70% chance to inflict Offense Down for 3 turns. Additionally, gain Taunt for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Door Die
abilities.description: If Scarif Rebel Pathfinder has any buffs when he is defeated, he is revived with 15% Max Health and 20% Turn Meter for each living Rebel ally. Whenever Scarif Rebel Pathfinder is defeated all other allies gain Speed Up for 2 turns.

name: Hermit Yoda
description: Jedi recluse who imparts sage wisdom in the ways of the Force

abilities.name: Master'sProtection
abilities.description: All other allies recover 10% Health and 5% Protection. All other Jedi allies gain 5% Turn Meter.

abilities.name: Master'sTraining
abilities.description: Yoda gains Stealth for 2 turns. Dispel all debuffs on target other ally and grant them the Master's Training unique buff until the end of the battle. Then, call all allies with Master's Training to Assist.Master's Training: +25% (doubled on Jedi) Accuracy, Defense, Offense, Potency, and Tenacity. Can't be Dispelled or Prevented.

abilities.name: StrengthFlows From the Force
abilities.description: All allies have their current Health percentages equalized. (Health equalizing effects ignore Healing Immunity.) Then, all allies recover 20% Health and Protection and Jedi allies gain Foresight for 2 turns.

abilities.name: InExile
abilities.description: Yoda gains Stealth for 2 turns at the start of each encounter and has +100% Evasion while Stealthed. When there are no active allies, Yoda escapes from the battle.

abilities.name: Door Do Not
abilities.description: Whenever an ally with Master's Training is defeated, Yoda gains 100% Turn Meter and resets all of his cooldowns.

name: IG-86 Sentinel Droid
description: Droid Attacker with a powerful Droid Assist and devastating Criticals

abilities.name: PrecisionStrike
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with an additional 50% chance of a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: AssassinDroid Tactics
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and call a random ally to Assist. If the Assisting ally is a Droid, both attackers have an additional 75% Critical Damage.

abilities.name: DroidSquad Tactics
abilities.description: IG-86 gains 4.5% Critical Chance for each living Droid ally. In addition, he has +20% Critical Damage.

name: Jawa
description: Attacker effective against debuffed enemies as well as Droids

abilities.name: ExploitWeakness
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to inflict Speed Down for 2 turns. This attack deals 35% more damage to enemies suffering from a negative status effect.

abilities.name: StunSurprise
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies with a 75% chance to Stun Droids for 1 turn and a 25% chance to Stun other enemies for 1 turn.

abilities.name: AmbushTactics
abilities.description: Jawa gains 6% Evasion for each living Jawa ally, and gains 30% Turn Meter whenever he Evades an attack.

name: First Order SF TIE Pilot
description: Subversive First Order Attacker who buffs allies and disrupts enemies

abilities.name: Reciprocation
abilities.description: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Defense Down for 2 turns. Then, if the target has Defense Down, gain Advantage for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Drumfire
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to all enemies and inflict Defense Down for 2 turns on each Critically Hit enemy. First Order allies gain Speed Up for 2 turns.

abilities.name: OppressiveBurst
abilities.description: Deal Special damage to target enemy and call target other ally to Assist. If target other ally is First Order, they gain Advantage for 2 turns and Stun the target enemy for 1 turn.
